nodes.text: A cane was a device used to assist an individual in walking. It could also be used as a status symbol.[source?]
Many individuals in the galaxy owned canes, including Emperor Palpatine and Jedi Master Yoda, the latter of whom owned a gimer stick given to him by the Wookiees.
Some Force-users incorporated detachable lightsabers into their canes, such as elderly Jedi Master Tera Sinube and former Sith Lord Maul.
In 35 ABY,[source?] Landonis Balthazar Calrissian used a cane, the head of which was carved in the shape of Cloud City and included his name as an inscription.
